entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tv remote control OK button not working in CollectionView #14716
  • WinUI TitleView is offset incorrectly from the top of the page #14715
    .NET 8
  • AbsoluteLayout works in preview, breaks when restarting the app. #14713
  • [Android] Button text alignment inconsistencies #14712
  • [Android] CollectionView scrolling is not smooth and bounces #14711
  • [Android] CollectionView height does not immediately update on screen rotation #14710
  • MAUI: button not working in custom element (in derived class) after overriding "ArrangeOverride" #14709
  • [Android] Investigate SearchBar presentation in horizontal screen orientation #14708
  • Cursor position is at the beginning of entry/editor #14707
  • MeasureInvalided of the Parent is not being invoked when a Child invalidates itself #14706
  • Get Userlocation from map control #14700
  • [iOS] SwipeView fails when wrapping an Editor control #14699
  • Setting main page from modal async page does nothing on Android #14697

Closed

  • To can check if location is enabled #14682
  • WKUIDelegate.RunJavaScriptTextInputPanel bad implementation #14695
  • Getting a XamlC error when trying to use common xmlns only in XAML without x:Name #7503
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't measure text spans if type is HTML #14705
    area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested
  • Update All (most) BindableProperty XML docs #14704
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Correctly re-apply font formatting to HTML text #14701
    area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested

Updated

  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Switch to AppWindowTitleBar From SetTitleBar #14517
  • "Rename" Windows' Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
  • Added ICommandMapper for extension methods #14545
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [net7.0] Make MAUI into a workload based on NuGet packs #14331
    area/setup 🪄
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
